shyvolcano75: Hellz yes. Also why the vacant smile?! I want to see RBF Barbie or Melafuckingcholic and/or Fierce Barbie - with BUSH. 🌳
kristinannehm: Goodness. In the summers my friends and I have a spot where we swim naked (it's the local naked swimming spot, everyone who goes there, old/young/families are all naked). Anyways I remember one summer a friend agonising over whether or not she should shave all her pubic hair off, or leave a strop, and literally wondering what other girls she knew might be doing, so she could be just like them. I was like honey, just do what you want! I could hardly wrap my head around someone caring so much about pubic hair, and what other women's vulvas might look like!!! Our society does us so many disservices. Growing up in Europe I definitely missed a lot of this nonsense, depending on which country, body hair is usually *not* a big deal like it is here (US).
apple_is_life_: If your partner makes you feel like you have to shave anything —dump them. They've internalized so much shit and are projecting
hair_by_gina: There’s a video @willowsmith posted of her practicing archery and she had on a sleeveless top that exposed the hair underneath her arm and people criticized the hell out of her for it. I never understood why people cared so much about someone else damn body and how they choose to embrace it. Now there’s a body hair glitter trend happening! I’m not rolling up my damn pubic hair to make others feel comfortable; you gone get what I give you. PeriodT. Thanks @ihartericka for always shading light on things we all seem to over look. 🙏🏽

bluebird_momma: I played with Barbies my whole childhood and this NEVER crossed my mind!
damnitkeely: I don’t disagree but maybe they don’t because they don’t want to sexualize kids toys
dontbeeaskingmehowtosaymyname: Oooohhh, I remember in college when I shaved my head to go natural, I was suite mates with one of the most beautiful women I’ve ever known, and she’d just cut her super long hair into a sharp bob so we were talking about hair.
